attributes.action: Make it so people who are on benefits should work for there money
attributes.additional_details: People on benefits get money just given to them for nothing yet the rest of the country have to work hard for there money so it should be fair all round
attributes.background: People on benefits that are more than capable to do this should have to earn there money I.e by tidying up the streets and parks while everyone else is out working to pay there benefits

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Not everyone who receives benefits is able to work, so we're not sure exactly how you would like this to work.
